title: A question regarding the hextech crafting system and my past toxicity.
body:
So, I was a real dick head back in the day, like 3-5 months back. I got my chat restriction and also crafting punishment. I served all my punishments and since then I haven't gotten a punishment notification. So why after 5 months am I still screwed on hextech crafting?

Is this permanent? Help me out here guys.

replies.body:
The duration of ineligibility is related to the recency and severity of your penalties, in addition to your current behavior.

You have received a 14-day ban and 2 chat restrictions with the 14-day less than 3 months ago (not just a chat restriction). In order to become eligible again you must show you've changed your behavior for a meaningful period of time in relation to your penalties.
This is actually a great system, it doesn't just consist of fulfilling out the punishment it consists of keeping that good behavior up during the next period of time. ^_^
Why did he get two chat restrictions before a 14-day ban and I didn't????????
What you said was probably a lot worse than what he said
